document_type: Final Determination Notification and Payroll Authorization Forms
security: The document is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically concerning William A. Webb, and includes related payroll authorization forms.
summary_one_paragraph: The Assassination Records Review Board issued a Final Determination Notification on December 8, 1995, regarding House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) staff payroll records (Record Number 180-10147-10266), focusing on William A. Webb. The notification indicates that while the document has significant historical interest, Social Security numbers are postponed due to privacy concerns, and the document includes payroll authorization forms detailing Webb's employment as Staff Counsel with the HSCA from October 1977 to December 1978, along with a memorandum about payroll certification and his background.
title: Final Determination Notification Regarding HSCA Staff Payroll Records
